title: Aura Speaks AI
subtitle: When I cannot speak, Aura speaks for me.
alertStatus: I am having a seizure. I am not in control.
instructions: Stay calm. I should be okay in a few minutes.
Time the seizure. Call 911 if it lasts more than 5 minutes.
Keep me safe. Move sharp objects away.
Gently roll me onto my side to help with breathing.
Cushion my head with something soft.
Do NOT hold me down or restrict my movements.
Do NOT put anything in my mouth.
Stay with me until the seizure is over and I am fully awake.
ttsIntro: A medical emergency is in progress. Please follow these instructions.
noContactsMessage: No emergency contacts have been added. Please add them in Settings.
chatClearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear the chat history?
chatInitialGreeting: Hello! I'm Aura. I can provide information on seizure first aid. How can I help? Note: I am not a medical professional.
settingsAPIKeyDesc: Aura AI features require a Gemini API Key. Get one from Google AI Studio. Your key is saved only on this device.
apiKeyHelpTitle: How to get a free Gemini API Key
chatAPIKeyMissing: Please add your Gemini API Key in settings to use Aura.
settingsShakeDesc: Rapidly shake your phone 3 times to trigger the emergency alert. Useful if you cannot unlock your phone.
aboutStory: I had a near seizure... I was eating a sandwich and a coffee in the airport in Medellin, when suddenly it hit me. I didn't have a way to express myself, words went away. I pulled my phone but to call who? My girlfriend an hour away? I needed to communicate but my mind was racing. I drank my coffee rapidly and the symptoms faded. As I felt better, I opened my laptop right there in the airport and started prototyping this app. It wasn't about the coffee anymore; in that fraction of 'Aura' time, all we look for is a way to speak up.
aboutMissionText: This is not a medical app but a tool to inspire and help potentially others. Please read our full disclosure.
noReportsMessage: No alert history has been recorded yet.
notesPlaceholder: Add notes about this event (e.g., potential triggers, feelings)...
disclaimerText1: This application is for informational purposes only.
disclaimerText2: This application is NOT a certified medical device. It is intended as an informational tool to assist in attracting attention and providing guidance to bystanders during a potential medical event.
disclaimerText3: It should not be solely relied upon for emergency situations. In case of a medical emergency, always call your local emergency services immediately.
disclaimerText4: The developer assumes no liability for the use or misuse of this application.
disclaimerPrivacy: Privacy & Data Security: This app operates 100% locally. No personal data, contacts, or medical information is ever transmitted to us or any third-party servers. We do not track you.
installDescIOS: Install this app on your home screen for quick access and offline use.
installDescAndroid: Get the free, local-first app for offline access and better performance.
updateDesc: A new version of the app is available. Reload to update.
testModeNote: Test mode will NOT trigger real emergency alerts. This is safe to test.
chatErrorConnection: Sorry, connection failed. Please check your API Key in Settings.
chatErrorInvalidKey: Error: Invalid API Key. Please update it in Settings.
chatErrorQuota: Error: Usage limit exceeded. Please try again later.
ttsErrorNotSupported: Text-to-speech not supported in this browser.
settingsErrorRequired: Name and Phone Number are required fields.
nfcSuccess: ✅ Success! Tag programmed. Tap it to test.
nfcWriteFailed: ❌ Write failed. Make sure NFC is on and the tag is unlocked.
backupSuccess: Backup file generated! Please save it.
testStep1: Hold your device firmly with both hands
testStep2: Shake vigorously or simulate a drop motion (without letting go!)
testStep4: Watch for 'Fall Confirmed' status and feel the vibration
settingsAppModeDesc: Choose the safety mode that matches your needs. This changes the alerts and terminology.
deviceMotionNotSupported: Device motion not supported on this device.
preventSleepDesc: Keep screen on during monitoring to ensure reliability.
lowPowerModeDesc: Reduces visualizer updates and background checks to save battery.
settingsCustomMessageDesc: This message will be displayed on the screen during an emergency.
settingsDisconnectConfirm: Disconnect Aura AI? Voice features will stop working.
nfcDesc: Program an NFC tag to instantly launch this app in Emergency Mode when tapped.
settingsDataManagementDesc: Export your data to a file for safekeeping, or transfer it to another device.
settingsDataManagementNote: Note: Data is exported as a plain JSON file. Keep it safe.
settingsAuraNotConnectedDesc: Connect to enable voice assistant features.
settingsInstallDesc: Install this app on your device for quick access and offline capabilities.
settingsInstallManualDesc: Try installing manually via your browser menu:
settingsNFCNotSupported: NFC is not supported on this device/browser. Try using Chrome on Android, or a dedicated NFC Tools app to write this URL: {{url}}
preventSleepDescription: Keep screen on during monitoring to ensure reliability.
lowPowerModeDescription: Reduces visualizer updates and background checks to save battery.
customAlertMsgDesc: This message will be displayed on the screen during an emergency.
disconnectAuraConfirm: Disconnect Aura AI? Voice features will stop working.
appInstallationDesc: Install this app on your device for quick access and offline capabilities.
iosStep1: Tap the Share button in your browser toolbar.
iosStep2: Scroll down and tap Add to Home Screen.
iosStep3: Confirm by tapping Add in the top corner.
nfcActivationDesc: Program an NFC tag to instantly launch this app in Emergency Mode when tapped.
nfcStep2: When prompted, hold your phone near a writable NFC tag.
nfcStep3: The tag will be programmed with the "Emergency Link".
dataManagementDesc: Export your data to a file for safekeeping, or transfer it to another device.
dataManagementNote: Note: Data is exported as a plain JSON file. Keep it safe.
restoreConfirm: WARNING: This will overwrite your current app data with the backup file. Are you sure?
manualInstallDesc: Try installing manually via your browser menu:
chromeAndroidSteps: Tap ⋮ (three dots) → Install App or Add to Home screen.
safariIOSSteps: Tap Share → Add to Home Screen.
desktopSteps: Look for an install icon in the address bar.
wizardFreeDesc: To power Aura's voice features, you need a free secure key from Google. Follow these steps:
wizardStep1Open: Click the blue button below to open Google AI Studio.
wizardStep2SignIn: Sign in with your standard Google Account.
wizardStep3Create: Click the "Create API Key" button on the top left.
wizardStep4Copy: Copy the long secret key that is generated.
wizardStep5Close: Close that tab, come back here, and proceed to the next step to paste it.
aiHubGoogleDesc: Required for advanced analysis and diagnostics.
aiHubPicovoiceDesc: Voice activation requires a Picovoice Access Key to process "Hey Aura" locally on your device.
aiHubDisabledNote: Note: Voice activation is disabled until an Access Key is provided. Your audio is processed 100% locally and never leaves this device.
